original_text: As for the ram that you saw with the two horns, these are the kings of Media and Persia.
korean_text: 네가 본 바 두 뿔 가진 숫양은 곧 메대와 바사 왕들이요

sentences.original_text: As for the ram that you saw with the two horns
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 본 두 뿔 가진 그 수양은

sentences.original_text: these are the kings of Media and Persia.
